attributes.action: Scrap the 70mph speed limit on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speed limits were set using very old vehicles with double the stopping distances of the average modern car, although people must sit a high speed awareness session every 5 years, there should then be no upper speed limit for the outside lane

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
